entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:12 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -40.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 8:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -40.4°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -44.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 57 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill minus 51 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
